alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 25 at 4:34AM AKST until December 25 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Southern and central outer coast, including the vicinity of Baranof and Kruzof Islands, southern Kuiu Island and Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Additional stress on harbor floats and gangways. Erosion of the coast and minor flooding of infrastructure near the high tide line due to wind waves. Skiffs and other property near the high tide line may be lost. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide is predicted between 126pm and 144pm. Locations at sea level exposed to the SE, such as Port Alexander, have the greatest potential for minor coastal flooding.
info.instruction: A coastal flood advisory indicates that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low lying areas along the shore.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
